TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Exploding cakes end humanity.

I wish for Polandball.

Granted. You turn Polandball to get a better look at it, causing the entire country of Poland to shift and destroying much of Europe. No one is pleased.

Or something like that.

I wish that I could build better rockets in KSP.

Granted. Scott Manley kills you for being a spy disguised as him.

I wished Fyre Flare didn't just say "nope", and actually corrupted the wish.

Nope. :trollface:

I wish for hedonism.

Granted. Unfortunately life isn't very good.

I wish Mudkipz Weren't Eternal.

Granted. however, the wish isn't corrupted, and therefore i troll you by ruining your expectations!

I wish i could do normal, visible text. Aswell as not being small and bold and italic.

Of course! Don't you know anything about science? But NASA's ARM is a success and Earth is saved. Sadface.

Reverse Psychology, Mission complete.

Granted.

To corrupt the previous wisher's wish, the next user must say things in bold, ittalicized, fonted, invisible text!

How about no.

Oh fine. Granted, but not with text.

I wish for one uniform font and color for this forum.

Granted. Its white colour and the worst possible font.

I wish for cookie with chocolate that is tasty.

Granted.

text!

but not with text.

nuuuu

terrible corruption

Granted. The Cookie Clicker machine eats it and gives it to another internet user.

I wish that the next user found a better way to corrupt my text-related wish.

Granted! But you instantly get teleported to the Moon. (Totally a text corruption)

I wish to have an antimatter container.

Granted, unfortunately your now inside the container too

I wish i never seen my own childs dying in front of my eyes

Granted. Instead, you are blinded with a white-hot iron poker, and writhe in agony. Your children are then brought before you, screaming in agony as they are branded like cattle. Then, we just kill them quickly. Not even we like the sound of that scream. A pity, really.

I wish for a cloud.

Granted, but everyone else in your immediate family dies in front of your eyes. I'm sorry, but such a dark wish needed such a dark answer.

I wish my computer had more memory to handle my mod addiction.

EDIT: Well then, I stand corrected. I guess I'm not the most horribly twisted and sinister person on this forum after all. Who knew? Also, granted but you realize that clouds are in fact not solid entities as you plummet towards the ground contemplating your impending death.

EDIT II: EDIT HARDER: Alright, I give up. Forget it. Disregard my wish entirely.

Edited June 1, 2014 by IndigoCypher00

Granted but you get an electrobolt that strike yourself then some rain

I wish for a wild spider web

Granted, but everyone else in your immediate family dies in front of your eyes. I'm sorry, but such a dark wish needed such a dark answer.

I wish my computer had more memory to handle my mod addiction.

Edited June 1, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
too late posting oops

But the spider kills you.

I wish I had a Jeb plushie.

It burns. You're life is ruined.

I wish for a flag.

Granted, it was behind you just endlessly forgot to look that way xD

I wish i never forgot too xD (bis)

Edited June 1, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
the rules againzzz

Your brain explodes from overload.

I wish for a new I7 Extreme CPU

Granted, but the CPU explodes spontaneously.

I wish for more wishes.

Granted. I get more wishes.

I wish for m0ar mudkipz.

Granted, But you cant decide what to wish, so you spend the rest of your days in a catatonic state.

I wish i knew what catatonic means

EDIT: DAMMIT NINJA'D BY A MUDKIP

@THENEWwhatever

Granted, but they are explosive

somehow

I wished i could build something else in ksp that wasn't millitary in nature.

Edited June 1, 2014 by Anister

Granted. Everything else you build is mowed down by space pirates, which you also built.

I wish that modifications moderated and that moderators were modifications.

Modification - Kip

I wish for my Mudkip Powers to rise.
